Mike how do you plan to do the experiment?
=A0
I have some thoughts on this=
.
=A0
You said you have some items.
=A0
Find a location out in the middle o=
f nowhere, and just bring your recording equipment. Try for 15 minutes to s=
ee if you can get any spirits.
=A0
Then go to that same location, lets say =
the next day and bring the items you have, and then try and record again fo=
r about 15 minutes.
=A0
It will be interesting if you then pick up a spirit=
 by just having the items with you.
=A0
With my radio I can not hear realti=
me, but if you have a device where you can hear real time, on the day you g=
o back to that remote location but with the items, if you do get spirits, t=
ry to inquire if they are tied to the item you have.
=A0
Mike Edwards


=A0=
